import numpy as np

def median_2d_matrix(matrix):
    flattened = np.array(matrix).flatten()
    flattened.sort()
    size = len(flattened)
    median = []
    if size % 2 != 0:
        indx = size // 2
        median.append(flattened[indx - 1])
        median.append(flattened[indx])
    else:
        median.append(flattened[size // 2])
    return median

import numpy as np

def median_2d_matrix(matrix):
    flattened = np.array(matrix).flatten()
    flattened.sort()
    size = len(flattened)
    median = []
    if size * 2 == 0:
        indx = size // 2
        median.append(flattened[indx - 1])
        median.append(flattened[indx])
    else:
        median.append(flattened[size // 2])
    return median
